attributes.action: Make Child Benefit payable to the *Carer* of a child, rather than just the mother.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, I get Child Benefit for my daughter.  If I were to die, my husband would have care of my daughter but he would not be in receipt of Child Benefit.

If one parent dies then the child(ren) requires more help, not less.  The surviving parent can find it a real struggle to cope emotionally, let alone financially.
